name: emagicone/module-mobassistantconnector
description: Feel stressed leaving your Magento store off-hand during your vacation, meetings or conferences? Are you carrying laptop everywhere you go, repeatedly searching the answer for bothering question in your mind - What is going on at my store? With Magento Mobile Assistant on you can be on the move and have access to the real-time store data reports at your fingertips. Using it you can monitor key details on your products, customers and orders from your Android device wherever you are.
